wikipedia_page.main: Geoff Smith (born 1966) is an English composer, academic and university Vice Chancellor. He has written and recorded four studio albums, performed internationally and been compared to such composers as Philip Glass and Steve Reich. In August 2019, he became the Vice Chancellor and CEO of Regent's University London, having formerly served as the Senior Deputy Vice Chancellor of Falmouth University and Head of Music & Performing Arts at Bath Spa University.

response: *Geoff Smith and Nicola Walker: "New Voices" (Amadeus Press, 1995)
* Geoff Smith - Gas • Food • Lodging - featuring the Balanescu Quartet (1993)
Geoff Smith (born 1961) is a musical performer and composer from Brighton, England.  He was previously a member of the group Attacco Decente. He was a pupil at Varndean College from 1974.
*Geoff Smith (music composer) (born 1966), English composer, academic and vice chancellor of Regent's University London

*Geoff Smith (mathematician) (born 1953), former leader of the United Kingdom International Mathematical Olympiad team
*Geoff Smith (ice hockey) (born 1969), former National Hockey League defenceman
